short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bumble copilot,a chatbot that helps people have better conversations, get brainstorm ideas, and promotes friendly communication.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install the HeyU plugin and use it on the Bumble website. The plugin will automatically appear on the right side.
